channel.title: Unchangeable stuff
channel.description:
Once again, I'm having the problem with moving and changing things.
I'm using reaperscape v2 source by the way
Basically, i can edit the coordinates and values of things but some things (like portals) stay in the exact spot. Even after I've saved and compiled. I go back and look and its showing the right coordinates but the portal is still in the old spot.
Any help with this would be awesome

item.title: Unchangeable stuff
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

well i can do it in a matter of 2 minutes if you have Team Viewer

Read full topic

item.title: Unchangeable stuff
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

[quote=“FusionLord, post:8, topic:258184”]searce for case with the objectid

like, Furnace’s id is 2781

i looked under
case 2781:

case 2781 if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[13]), 13); addItem(995, 1000000); sendMessage("You Gain Some Smithing, and get some Cash!."); setAnimation(0x378); actionTimer = 15; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } break; [/quote]

There’s no coordinates there to change.

basically I’ve changed the globalobject coordinates to the new ones that i want, but after saving and compiling (with no errors) the portals are still in the old spot. Even when i look back at globalobjects it shows the new coordinates that i changed it too.

Read full topic

item.title: Unchangeable stuff
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

searce for case with the objectid

like, Furnace’s id is 2781

i looked under
case 2781:

case 2781
            if (actionTimer == 0) {	
                addSkillXP((1700 * playerLevel[13]), 13);
                addItem(995, 1000000);
                sendMessage("You Gain Some Smithing, and get some Cash!.");	
                setAnimation(0x378);
                actionTimer = 15;
                updateRequired = true; 
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            }
            break;

Read full topic

item.title: Unchangeable stuff
item.dc:creator: @k0_twin k0 twin
item.description:
@k0_twin wrote:

chassy13:

Are you making a completely new object or just changing the coordinates? If you are making a completely new one, make sure you delete the other one.

I’m just changing to coordinates of already existing portals.

Javac Batch:

You can’t just change the globalobject coord. If it’s clickable you have to make the same coords in the clickable case. Case 51 I think.

Ok yeah that makes sense, but my problem is I can’t find the clickable case for these portals. I’ve searched my client.java for all traces of the portal and its previous coordinates to see if there was anything else i needed to change, but nothing shows up when i search. Do i need to look somewhere besides client.java? I’m unsure where else the clickable case would be

Read full topic
